TopicTitle: What site to use to upload .craft files to

Articles.Content: I know that there are many file sharing web sites out there, but I would like your guy's recommendations on the best ones to use.
I use mediafire , but kerbalX seems good too.
Yeah, kerbalX... IIRC, it automatically detects required mods, and adds them to the listing...
I highly recommend dropbox, if you want to share your crafts on the forums
Kerbal x it lists mods and a ckan file to install them all in one go

I'm perhaps a little biased but KerbalX.com!!

I built KerbalX for the KSP community, so it's totally geared towards KSP craft. It's main features are automatically detecting which mods craft use (and creating a mod list for you) and a search that enables you to filter craft by what mods they use (or just list pure stock), part-count, VAB/SPH, specific science parts etc.

Each craft has a page that you can customize with text, pics and vids and you can create custom groups of craft (hangars).

If you use CKAN you can download .ckan metafiles for craft (and now hangars) which tell the CKAN mod manager which mods it needs to install for that craft. You can also drop your installed-default.ckan file (found in the CKAN folder in KSP) on the mod filters part of the search interface and KerbalX will find craft that are compatible with the mods you have installed.

I'm still adding features and improving existing things so if you want something particular or have other suggestions add it on the forum thread and I'll see what I can do. Currently working on a couple collaborations; 1 that will enable craft on KerbalX to be 3D printed (by eucl3d, note: not all mod craft will be printable), and linuxgurugamer is working on a mod that will enable craft uploads directly from within the game.
Na, dropbox, don't want to have too many internet accounts

KerbalX if you want your craft to be "public", for example it's something you've basically done and feel is good enough to let others fly.

Any one-click-hosting site if it's something semi-private, for example a ship in development you want some help with.
